## CharityORG.luckyRemove() method

Lucky Removes an active piece

**Signature:**

```typescript
luckyRemove(name): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | (not declared) | The name of the banner piece to remove |

**Returns:**

boolean

True if the piece was removed, False if not.

## Remarks

RAM cost: 0 GB

Removes an active piece and places it back into the storage container. Must have a lucky coin to do so.
